html:
Dec 17 (Reuters) - COMPETITION COMMISSION OF INDIA:

  • IMPOSES PENALTY OF 2 BILLION RUPEES UPON AMAZON

  • AMAZON'S 2019 DEAL WITH FUTURE TO REMAIN IN ABEYANCE

  • ALL DISCLOSURE CONTRAVENTIONS ARISE "FROM A DELIBERATE DESIGN" BY AMAZON "TO SUPPRESS" SCOPE OF 2019 FUTURE DEAL

  • AMAZON FAILED TO NOTIFY CERTAIN COMMERCIAL ARRANGEMENTS AS PART OF 2019 FUTURE DEAL

  • AMAZON "SUPPRESSED THE ACTUAL PURPOSE AND PARTICULARS" OF 2019 FUTURE DEAL

  • COMMISSION CONSIDERS IT NECESSARY TO EXAMINE THE 2019 AMAZON-FUTURE UNIT DEAL AFRESH

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
